# Data wrangling with dplyr
### from _"Introduction to Open Data Science"_ 

We are going to use "gapminder" data to learn 'dplyr'. It's going to be amazing!  

> Useful shortcuts 

* Insert R snippet = Cmd Opt i 
* Insert object assignment = Alt -
* Insert pipe = Cmd Shift M
* See all shortcuts = Alt Shift K
 
```{r}
(x <- seq(1:15))
```
